name.en: Centre for Teacher Education and Higher Education

structural_unit_name.en: Centre for Teacher Education and Higher Education

description.en: The subject gives students the freedom to plan (with the support of the lecturer guiding the process) the subject that best supports their professional development based on their personal needs, study (if necessary, reflecting with the lecturer) according to this plan and evaluate what they learn and plan their further study path.
description.et: Õppeaine annab üliõpilastele vabaduse personaalsetest vajadustest lähtuvalt kavandada (protsessi juhendava õppejõu toel) endale just tema professionaalset arengut parimal viisil toetav õppeaine, õppida (vajadusel õppejõuga reflekteerides) selle kava järgi ja hinnata õpitavat ning kavandada edasine õpitee.

objectives.en: To increase the possibilities of shaping students' personal learning path. The subject gives students the freedom to plan the subject that best supports their professional development based on their personal needs, study according to this plan and evaluate what they learn, and plan their further study path.
objectives.et: Suurendada üliõpilaste personaalse õpitee kujundamise võimalusi. Õppeaine annab üliõpilastele vabaduse personaalsetest vajadustest lähtuvalt kavandada endale just tema professionaalset arengut parimal viisil toetav õppeaine, õppida selle kava järgi ja hinnata õpitavat ning kavandada edasine õpitee.

learning_outcomes.en: has planned for herself/himself the subject that best supports her/his professional development;
learning_outcomes.et: on kavandanud endale just tema professionaalset arengut parimal viisil toetava õppeaine;

learning_outcomes.en: has learned based on the planned plan and evaluated the achievement of learning outcomes;
learning_outcomes.et: on õppinud kavandatud plaanile tuginedes ja andnud hinnangu õpiväljundite saavutamisele;

learning_outcomes.en: has planned further development steps based on self-analysis.
learning_outcomes.et: on kavandanud eneseanalüüsile tuginedes edasised arengusammud.

notes.et: Õppeaine on mõeldud Humanitaar- ja sotsiaalainete õpetamine põhikoolis bakalaureuseõppe üliõpilastele.

name.en: Centre for Teacher Education and Higher Education
